import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext'; import '../styles/Auth.css'; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', role: 'guest', phone: '', address: '' }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const { register } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); if (error) setError(''); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setError(''); setLoading(true); const result = await register(formData); if (result.success) { navigate('/dashboard'); } else { setError(result.message); } setLoading(false); }; const getPasswordStrength = () => { const password = formData.password; if (password.length === 0) return { strength: 0, text: '', color: '' }; if (password.length < 6) return { strength: 1, text: 'Weak', color: '#dc3545' }; if (password.length < 10) return { strength: 2, text: 'Medium', color: '#ffc107' }; return { strength: 3, text: 'Strong', color: '#28a745' }; }; const passwordStrength = getPasswordStrength(); return (
